details: Product is Out of Stock (OOS) but had recent ad spend of $4,500.00, leading to wasted clicks and revenue loss.
Losing the Buy Box to 'TechDeals Prime'. This directly diverts sales to a third-party seller.
Losing the Buy Box to 'FastShip Electronics'. This directly diverts sales to a third-party seller.
Inventory is critically low with an estimated 12 units. High risk of going OOS, impacting sales velocity and ad campaign performance.
Product is sold at $29.99, which is below the MAP of $31.99. This erodes brand value and partner trust.
Average rating is 3.8/5 based on 89 reviews. This can deter potential buyers and suppress CVR.
Average rating is 3.9/5 based on 156 reviews. This can deter potential buyers and suppress CVR.
Listing has content issues: missing_enhanced_content, incomplete_bullets. Improving content can increase conversion rate.
